## Contributor Reading Order

Read in this exact sequence before changing code:
1. `start_here.md`
2. `doc_invariants.md`
3. `06_CORE_CONTRACTS.md`
4. `04_TRACE_FORMAT.md`
5. `05_TRACE_LIFECYCLE.md`
6. `07_DETERMINISM.md`
7. `08_VERIFICATION_MODEL.md`
8. `10_SECURITY_MODEL.md`
9. `12_VERSIONING_COMPAT.md`
10. `doc_to_code_map.md`

Do not submit a PR if you cannot accept these constraints.***
